name: Quest Boutique Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Quest Boutique Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
 Located in Gwarinpa, within 8 miles of Magic Land Abuja and 11 miles of IBB Golf Club, Quest Boutique Hotel has accommodations with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with an electric tea pot. Rooms contain air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain accommodations at Quest Boutique Hotel have a city view.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. At Quest Boutique Hotel you'll find a restaurant serving African, American and Caribbean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested.

The nearest airport is Nnamdi Azikiwe International, 15 miles from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:

 Located in Lagos, 2.8 miles from Kalakuta Museum, God's Touch Apartments Signature has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, an electric tea pot, a shower, free toiletries and a closet. Certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop.

National Stadium Lagos is 7.2 miles from the hotel, while National Art Theatre is 9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Murtala Muhammed International, 4.3 miles from God's Touch Apartments Signature, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Swiss International The Vistana! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
 Located in Lekki, 3.1 miles from Lekki Conservation Centre, Swiss International The Vistana provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service and an ATM. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with an electric tea pot, while selected rooms will provide you with a terrace and others also have city views. At Swiss International The Vistana the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving African, American and Belgian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and dairy-free options can also be requested.

You can play tennis at this 4-star hotel.

Lekki Conservation Centre is 3.3 miles from Swiss International The Vistana, while Nike Art Gallery is 8.9 miles away. The nearest airport is Murtala Muhammed International Airport, 24 miles from the hotel.

description:

 The Destination by Gidanka has free bikes, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness center and garden in Abuja. Each room at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. The property has entertainment staff and room service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, an electric tea pot, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a minibar. At The Destination by Gidanka rooms have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving African, American and Chinese cuisine. Vegetarian, gluten-free and halal options can also be requested.

The Destination by Gidanka has a playground.

Speaking Arabic, English and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Magic Land Abuja is 4.2 miles from the hotel, while IBB Golf Club is 6.8 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Nnamdi Azikiwe International, 17 miles from The Destination by Gidanka, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
